comment: Corruption filters all the way down to mayoral elections! It was so blatantly obvious in Toronto, Canada. I would think that even people whose party won would see the censorship and obstruction of a candidate to participate, and find that alarming and a threat once the tides eventually turn on them. Canadians deserve better and so does Faith Goldy.

I would think that even people whose party won would see the censorship and obstruction of a candidate to participate, and find that alarming and a threat once the tides eventually turn on them. Canadians deserve better and so does Faith Goldy.
(m / multi-sentence

                  :name (n / name

                              :op1 "Canada")))
            :manner (b / blatant
                  :degree (s / so)))
      :snt3 (t / think-01

                  :op1 (s2 / see-01

                        :ARG1 (a3 / and
                              :op1 (c4 / censor-01
                                    :ARG1 (c5 / candidate))
                              :op2 (o2 / obstruct-01
                                    :ARG1 c5
                                    :purpose (p3 / participate-01
                                          :ARG0 c5))))
                  :op2 (f2 / find-02
                        :ARG0 p
                        :ARG1 (a4 / and
                              :op1 (a5 / alarm-01
                                    :ARG0 a3)
                              :op2 (t2 / threaten-01
                                    :ARG0 a3)
                              :time (t3 / turn-02
                                    :ARG1 (t4 / tide)
                                    :ARG2 p
                                    :time (e3 / eventual))))))
      :snt4 (a6 / and
            :op1 (d2 / deserve-01
                  :ARG0 (p4 / person
                        :mod c3
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Canada")))
            :ARG1 (g / good-02

comment: Bigoted hate speech containing the "n word" is not permitted here. Thank you for your help in keeping hate away.

comment: It doesn't make sense to hate an entire race or religion based on the actions of a few people.

                  :mod (e / entire))

                        :ARG0 (p / person
                              :quant (f / few))))))
